sentence.Network_en: He abjured the Protestant faith and became King in 1594.
sentence.Network_cn: 他放弃了新教信仰，于1594年登基为王。

sentence.Network_en: I am not completely at home in any Protestant Church.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在任何一个新教教会都不是特别自在。

sentence.Network_en: Most Protestant churches now have women ministers.
sentence.Network_cn: 如今大多数新教教会都有女牧师。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 38.新教概况新教是数百个基督教派的总称。新教各派人口总共约有3.8亿。 新教(Protestant)一词源自拉丁语,意为“抗议者”。1529年,某些德国宗教改革者首先使用此.
contestant 竞争者，参加比赛的人protestant 抗议者，异议者，新教徒resistant 抵抗者，反抗者
discontented 不满意的protestant新教徒，新教徒的，抗议者invincible 不可征服的，难以制服的
on the essence of protestant ethics ., 论基督新教伦理的思想实质.

list.abs: 图：2011年年度风云人物是抗议者（protesters）。图：1950年选出「美国战士」，是首次有群体获选。
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... detest v 嫌恶，憎恶 protest v 抗议；坚决声明 text n 课文，原文（文章为作者所编）.
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... protein 蛋白质 protest 抗议，反对v.抗议，反对 provide 供给，提供.

entry.def: A Protestant is a Christian who belongs to the branch of the Christian church which separated from the Catholic church in the sixteenth century.
Protestant means relating to Protestants or their churches.

example.ex: Most Protestant churches now have women ministers.
example.tran: 如今大多数新教教会都有女牧师。

auth_sentence.content: He was buried in the Protestant Cemetery in Rome.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was buried in the Protestant Cemetery in Rome.

auth_sentence.content: We try to build up a different culture Protestant ethics.
auth_sentence.res_content: We try to build up a different culture Protestant ethics.

auth_sentence.content: Both were Protestant, and both were literary.

means.word_mean: 新教徒(指16世纪脱离罗马天主教之基督教团体或后来由其形成的教派成员)

sentences.en: The vast majority of the workers here are Protestants.
sentences.cn: 这里的工人绝大多是新教徒。

sentences.en: The students of Umtata High School were mostly Protestant.
sentences.cn: 乌姆塔塔中学的学生大多数是新教徒。
